Question
========
At a preschool, 25 toddlers are divided into 5 groups (red, blue, yellow, green and purple). The preschool teacher compares the vocabulary of these children by testing the word knowledge of all the children and calculating the averages for each color group. She finds a $SS_{within}$ of 50.4. Further, she knows that she has explained 16% of the spread with the group color classification. TRUE is the value of the $MS_{between}$ who found them?

Answerlist
----------
* 1,92
* 2,52
* 9,6
* 2,4


Solution
========


Answerlist
----------
* This is with $DF_{between}$ = 5
* This is only $MS_{Within}$
* This is only $SS_{between}$
* This is correct
